svg.style: background: #FFFFFF; background-color: light-dark(#FFFFFF, #000000); color-scheme: light dark;
svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/142.0.0.0 Safari/537.36" version="29.1.1"> <diagram name="PulseCraft Architecture" id="pulsecraft-arch"> <mxGraphModel dx="1042" dy="562" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="1169" pageHeight="827" background="light-dark(#FFFFFF,#000000)" math="0" shadow="1"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="title" parent="1" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=18;fontStyle=1" value="PulseCraft - Customer Personalization Orchestrator Architecture" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="30" width="600" x="280" y="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="user" parent="1" style="shape=actor;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#dae8fc;strokeColor=#6c8ebf;fontSize=12;" value="User Browser" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="80" width="80" x="540" y="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="frontend-box" parent="1" style="swimlane;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#E3F2FD;strokeColor=#0078D4;fontSize=14;fontStyle=1" value="Frontend Layer" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="120" width="400" x="380" y="200" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="frontend-ui" parent="frontend-box" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#b1ddf0;strokeColor=#10739e;" value="Frontend UI<br>(HTML/CSS/JavaScript)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="60" width="160" x="20" y="35" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="azure-static" parent="frontend-box" style="ellipse;shape=cloud;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#0078D4;strokeColor=#0078D4;fontColor=#ffffff;" value="Azure Static Web Apps" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="60" width="170" x="210" y="35" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="backend-box" parent="1" style="swimlane;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#E8F5E9;strokeColor=#43A047;fontSize=14;fontStyle=1" value="API Gateway Layer" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="120" width="400" x="380" y="360" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="express-api" parent="backend-box" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#b9e0a5;strokeColor=#56b50f;" value="Express.js API<br>(Node.js Backend)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="60" width="160" x="20" y="35" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="azure-functions" parent="backend-box" style="ellipse;shape=cloud;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#43A047;strokeColor=#43A047;fontColor=#ffffff;" value="Azure App Service /<br>Azure Functions" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="60" width="170" x="210" y="35" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="service-bus" parent="1" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#fff4e6;strokeColor=#d79b00;" value="Azure Service Bus<br>(Agent Messaging Queue)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="50" width="260" x="450" y="520" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="agent-box" parent="1" style="swimlane;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#FFF3E0;strokeColor=#F57C00;fontSize=14;fontStyle=1" value="Multi-Agent Orchestration Layer" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="140" width="920" x="120" y="610" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="enricher-agent" parent="agent-box" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#ffe6cc;strokeColor=#d79b00;fontSize=11;" value="1. Enricher Agent<br>────────<br>Input: Customer ID<br>Output: Enriched Profile" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="85" width="180" x="20" y="35" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="scorer-agent" parent="agent-box" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#ffe6cc;strokeColor=#d79b00;fontSize=11;" value="2. Scorer Agent<br>────────<br>Input: Enriched Profile<br>Output: Ranked Opportunities" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="85" width="180" x="240" y="35" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="composer-agent" parent="agent-box" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#ffe6cc;strokeColor=#d79b00;fontSize=11;" value="3. Composer Agent<br>────────<br>Input: Ranked Opportunities<br>Output: Multi-channel Messages" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="85" width="200" x="460" y="35" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="compliance-agent" parent="agent-box" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#ffe6cc;strokeColor=#d79b00;fontSize=11;" value="4. Compliance Agent<br>────────<br>Input: Messages<br>Output: Validated Payload" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="85" width="180" x="700" y="35" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="azure-box" parent="1" style="swimlane;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#F3E5F5;strokeColor=#9C27B0;fontSize=14;fontStyle=1" value="Azure Services Layer" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="120" width="920" x="120" y="790" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="cosmos-db" parent="azure-box" style="shape=cylinder3;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;boundedLbl=1;backgroundOutline=1;size=15;fillColor=#e1bee7;strokeColor=#9C27B0;fontSize=10;" value="Azure Cosmos DB<br>(Customer Profiles)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="70" width="110" x="20" y="35" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="synapse" parent="azure-box" style="shape=cylinder3;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;boundedLbl=1;backgroundOutline=1;size=15;fillColor=#e1bee7;strokeColor=#9C27B0;fontSize=10;" value="Azure Synapse<br>(Retail Recommender)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="70" width="110" x="150" y="35" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="openai" parent="azure-box" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#0078D4;strokeColor=#0078D4;fontColor=#ffffff;fontSize=10;" value="Azure OpenAI<br>(GPT-4)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="70" width="110" x="280" y="35" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="blob-storage" parent="azure-box" style="shape=cylinder3;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;boundedLbl=1;backgroundOutline=1;size=15;fillColor=#e1bee7;strokeColor=#9C27B0;fontSize=10;" value="Azure Blob Storage<br>(Historical Data)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="70" width="110" x="410" y="35" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="key-vault" parent="azure-box" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#f8cecc;strokeColor=#b85450;fontSize=10;" value="Azure Key Vault<br>(Secrets)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="70" width="110" x="540" y="35" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="app-insights" parent="azure-box" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#d5e8d4;strokeColor=#82b366;fontSize=10;" value="Application Insights<br>(Monitoring)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="70" width="110" x="670" y="35" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="container-instances" parent="azure-box" style="ellipse;shape=cloud;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#0078D4;strokeColor=#0078D4;fontColor=#ffffff;fontSize=9;" value="Azure Container Instances<br>(Agent Runtime)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="70" width="100" x="800" y="35" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="arrow1" edge="1" parent="1" source="user" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#0078D4;" target="frontend-ui" value="1. User Request"> <mxGeometry height="50" relative="1" width="50" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="580" y="300" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="630" y="250" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="arrow2" edge="1" parent="1" source="frontend-ui" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#43A047;" target="express-api" value="2. HTTP POST /api/demo/run"> <mxGeometry height="50" relative="1" width="50" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="480" y="330" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="530" y="280" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="arrow3" edge="1" parent="1" source="express-api" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#F57C00;" target="service-bus" value="3. Enqueue Message"> <mxGeometry height="50" relative="1" width="50" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="520" y="490" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="570" y="440" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="arrow4" edge="1" parent="1" source="service-bus" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#F57C00;" target="enricher-agent" value="4. Process"> <mxGeometry height="50" relative="1" width="50" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="320" y="590" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="370" y="540" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="arrow5" edge="1" parent="1" source="enricher-agent" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#F57C00;" target="scorer-agent" value="5. Enrich"> <mxGeometry height="50" relative="1" width="50" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="300" y="680" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="350" y="630" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="arrow6" edge="1" parent="1" source="scorer-agent" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#F57C00;" target="composer-agent" value="6. Score (AI)"> <mxGeometry height="50" relative="1" width="50" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="480" y="680" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="530" y="630" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="arrow7" edge="1" parent="1" source="composer-agent" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#F57C00;" target="compliance-agent" value="7. Compose (AI)"> <mxGeometry height="50" relative="1" width="50" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="680" y="680" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="730" y="630" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="arrow8" edge="1" parent="1" source="enricher-agent" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;strokeWidth=1;strokeColor=#9C27B0;dashed=1;" target="cosmos-db" value=""> <mxGeometry height="50" relative="1" width="50" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="180" y="760" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="230" y="710" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="arrow9" edge="1" parent="1" source="enricher-agent" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;strokeWidth=1;strokeColor=#9C27B0;dashed=1;" target="synapse" value=""> <mxGeometry height="50" relative="1" width="50" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="230" y="760" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="280" y="710" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="arrow10" edge="1" parent="1" source="scorer-agent" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;strokeWidth=1;strokeColor=#0078D4;dashed=1;" target="openai" value=""> <mxGeometry height="50" relative="1" width="50" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="380" y="760" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="430" y="710" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="arrow11" edge="1" parent="1" source="composer-agent" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;strokeWidth=1;strokeColor=#0078D4;dashed=1;" target="openai" value=""> <mxGeometry height="50" relative="1" width="50" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="520" y="760" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="570" y="710" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="arrow12" edge="1" parent="1" source="enricher-agent" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;strokeWidth=1;strokeColor=#9C27B0;dashed=1;" target="blob-storage" value=""> <mxGeometry height="50" relative="1" width="50" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="330" y="760" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="380" y="710" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="arrow13" edge="1" parent="1" source="compliance-agent" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#43A047;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=1;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;curved=1;" target="express-api" value="8. Return Personalized Content"> <mxGeometry height="50" relative="1" width="50" as="geometry"> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="980" y="687" /> <mxPoint x="980" y="430" /> </Array> <mxPoint x="900" y="500" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="950" y="450" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="legend-box" parent="1" style="swimlane;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#f5f5f5;strokeColor=#666666;fontSize=12;fontStyle=1" value="Legend" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="190" width="280" x="40" y="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="legend1" parent="legend-box" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=#0078D4;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=10;" value="━━━ Data Flow" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="20" width="120" x="10" y="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="legend2" parent="legend-box" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=#9C27B0;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=10;dashed=1;" value="- - - Azure Service Call" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="20" width="150" x="10" y="55" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="legend3" parent="legend-box" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#E3F2FD;strokeColor=#0078D4;fontSize=9;" value="Frontend Layer (Blue)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="20" width="110" x="10" y="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="legend4" parent="legend-box" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#E8F5E9;strokeColor=#43A047;fontSize=9;" value="Backend Layer (Green)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="20" width="110" x="10" y="105" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="legend5" parent="legend-box" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#FFF3E0;strokeColor=#F57C00;fontSize=9;" value="Agent Layer (Orange)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="20" width="110" x="10" y="130" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="legend6" parent="legend-box" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#F3E5F5;strokeColor=#9C27B0;fontSize=9;" value="Azure Services (Purple)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="20" width="110" x="10" y="155" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="legend7" parent="legend-box" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=top;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=9;" value="Tech Stack:<br>• Node.js + Express<br>• Azure OpenAI GPT-4<br>• Cosmos DB (NoSQL)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="95" width="130" x="140" y="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="version" parent="1" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=right;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=9;fontColor=#999999;" value="v1.0 | Nov 2025 | PulseCraft MVP" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="20" width="160" x="880" y="920" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;

div.div:
1. Enricher Agent
────────
Input: Customer ID
Output: Enriched Profile

• Node.js + Express
• Azure OpenAI GPT-4
• Cosmos DB (NoSQL)
